SRI ALEX M THOMBRA- PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 03.01.2019 , THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Bane Crl.MC.No. 17 of 2019 3 2019 /KERIG ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioners are the accused in Crime No.3321 of 2018 of Aluva East Police Station, Ernakulam. They are alleged to have committed the offences under Sections 307, 326 and 506 IPC. Respondents 2 and 3 are the victims. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the trial court may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for _ the petitioners and respondents 2 and 3 and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. I have perused the affidavits filed by the respondents 2 and 3, who have entered appearance through counsel. TIT am satisfied that the matter has been settled and no public interest is involved in this case. There is no Bane Crl.MC.No. 17 of 2019 4 201/KERIG impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioners. In the result, this Crl.M.C is allowed. The proceedings in Crime No.3321 of 2018 of Aluva East Police Station, Ernakulam are quashed. If any material objects have been produced in this case, the trial court may pass appropriate orders for their disposal.
